itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with former Lethal Weapon star and huge Alabama football fan Clayne Crawford to get his predictions for every Top 25 game of the weekend.  Ross and Dan also draft their Fantasy Football Teams live on air for anyone looking for any last minute pointers.
